divs: Sighting DetailsObject was not observed when picture was taken. It was later discovered while reviewing the photos. The picture was taken in an aircraft at 47,000 feet over Brazil, about 100 miles north of Rio de Janeiro. I was the pilot of the airplane.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Rio de Janeiro
There were no other sightings in Rio de Janeiro on or around February 17th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
